qas.question: What is the Sanskrit form of Nibbana?
Many terms for Nibbana can be found throughout the what?
The desired goal for buddhism is what?

context: Although "Nibbāna" (Sanskrit: <a0_0><a2_0>Nirvāna<a2_0/><a0_0/>) is the common term for the desired goal of this practice, many other terms can be found throughout the <a1_0>Nikayas<a1_0/>, which are not specified.[note 35]
